page.title: 17Cotswold Promotion Line Pt.3
page.content: 6.Special"Saver"tickets for the whole line. 7.Since the formation of the Group the number of passengers using Evesham,Moreton-in-Marsh,Kingham and Charlbury(the only manned intermediate stations)has risen by nearly 30%. Although membership is aproaching the 2000 mark,these are only a few of those who banafit from the train service. This section of the line once belonged to the Great Western Railway Company which celebrated its 150th. bithday this year. Trains which use this line have changed from the beautiful old steam locos. to more advanced trains. Most on this line are diesel multiple units which are relatively old compared to main line trains.
